overview: Mr. Loffer has been involved in the operational and financial divisions of the Fund industry for over fourteen years. He joined Sand Hill Capital in April of 2004. Prior to Sand Hill, Mr. Loffer served as the Director of Fund Administration and Compliance at MVC Capital, the first publicly-traded venture capital firm. During his tenure at MVC Capital, Mr. Loffer assisted in the $330 million raise of capital in March of 2000. Prior to MVC Capital, Mr. Loffer spent six years managing the accounting functions for approximately 12 global debt and equity funds with combined assets exceeding $2.5 billion at GT Global.
